sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8ba845f69f513200bde5f79ff57fcf47
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.validateEmailAddress</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>validateEmailAddress</name><script><![CDATA[function validateEmailAddress(emailStr){
    // Use JavaScript coercion to guarantee emailStr is a string
    emailStr = emailStr + '';
    // Compare emailStr against the allowed syntax as specified in the regular expression
    // If emailStr has allowed syntax, return true, else return false
    if(emailStr.match(/^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/)){
        return true;
    }
    else return false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-08 03:42:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>8ba845f69f513200bde5f79ff57fcf47</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validateEmailAddress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8ba845f69f513200bde5f79ff57fcf47</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-08 03:42:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

gr.query();
// Log the number of records in the Problem table
gs.info("Total records in Problem table = " + gr.getRowCount());]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-16 21:29:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>af098a619f653200bde5f79ff57fcf53</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedIt Count Problem Records</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_af098a619f653200bde5f79ff57fcf53</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-16 21:29:13</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_embedded_help_content_b05eb1d34fee5300874e8020a310c740
sys_update_xml.payload:
truedashboardsDashboards list

ServiceNow® Dashboards enable you to display multiple Performance Analytics, reporting, and other widgets on a single screen. Use dashboards to create a story with data you can share with multiple users.

The Dashboards list shows the dashboards in your instance. The following columns are important:
  • Group — The dashboard group that this dashboard belongs to. The dashboards are sorted in the dashboard picker by these groups.
  • Active — Indicates if a dashboard is active in your instance. If false, the dashboard is unavailable.
Note: The columns Visible to, Groups, Users, and Requires Roles only apply to non-responsive dashboards. The values in these columns do not apply to responsive dashboards.

Click New to create a new dashboard.

]]>2018-06-12 16:34:09normalpa_dashboards_list-normalpa_dashboards_list11000truesys_embedded_help_contentsystem2018-06-12 16:34:09global/b05eb1d34fee5300874e8020a310c7400pa_dashboards_list-normal6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed16ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1sys_embedded_help_content_b05eb1d34fee5300874e8020a310c740system2018-06-12 16:34:09k

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_6e9c2dcf9f113200bde5f79ff57fcfd2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.GetEmailAddress</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script Include to return an email address.  The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a User table record.</description><name>GetEmailAddress</name><script><![CDATA[var GetEmailAddress = Class.create();
// Extend the global.AbstractAjaxProcessor class
GetEmailAddress.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
    // Define the getEmail function.  
    // Create a GlideRecord for the User table.
    // Use the sysparm_userID passed from the client side to retrieve a record from the User table.
    // Return the email address for the requested record
    getEmail: function() {
        var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
        userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
        return userRecord.email + '';
    },
    type: 'GetEmailAddress'

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_9373668d4fd93200cb281b818110c7f9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>NeedIt When needed field date</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// Instantiate the NeedItUtils class.  Call the isDatePast method and pass
	// the u_when_needed value.
	var niutils = new NeedItUtils();
	var isPast = niutils.isDatePast(current.u_when_needed);
	
	// If the isDatePast method returns true, the date is in the past.
	if(isPast == true){
		gs.addErrorMessage("When needed date cannot be in the past.  Your request has not been saved to the database.");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
	
	// pass the When needed field value to the isDateToday method in NeedItUtils
	var isToday = niutils.isDateToday(current.u_when_needed);
	
	// if the isDateToday method returns true the When needed date is today 
	if(isToday == true){
		gs.addErrorMessage("You cannot submit NeedIt requests for today.");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-03 00:44:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9373668d4fd93200cb281b818110c7f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedIt When needed field date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9373668d4fd93200cb281b818110c7f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-09 21:55:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9373668d4fd93200cb281b818110c7f9"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_map_13d5bc714fb13200cb281b818110c71e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>All Fields</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {
// If the source data does not have a u_requested_for_email field, 
// create the target email address from the Requested for value.  Email addresses 
// have the format firstname.lastname@example.com.  Convert the u_requested_for 
// value to lowercase.  Replace the space with a . and concatenate with 
// @example.com
if(!("u_requested_for_email" in source)){
    var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
    target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
}
})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_58872_needit_historic_</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-29 20:18:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>13d5bc714fb13200cb281b818110c71e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_13d5bc714fb13200cb281b818110c71e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-29 20:47:46</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_58872_needit_needit</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_embedded_help_content_5adac4eb4fe29300874e8020a310c776
sys_update_xml.payload:
truereportingInteractive Filters list
Interactive Filters allow you to filter report widgets directly from a homepage or dashboard without modifying the reports.
  1. Click the column headers to search, sort, filter, and edit data.
  2. Click New to create a new interactive filter.

    The Interactive Filters list has the following columns:

  • Look up name: The look up name for the filter. This name appears in the Add content menu for users adding a filter to a homepage or dashboard. Use this name to help organize your filters. If no look up name is specified, the Name value is used instead. Updated The date and time the filter was last modified.
  • Name: The name of the filter. This name appears on the dashboard widget for the filter.
  • Description: The description entered by the filter's creator.
  • Filter based on: The field type the filter is based on.
  • UI control type: How the available filtering options for this filter appear on the dashboard.
  • Updated: The date and time the filter was last modified.
Related information
Available Interactive Filter types
Available interactive filter UI control types
]]>2018-06-13 02:48:06normalsys_ui_hp_publisher_list-normalsys_ui_hp_publisher_list11000truesys_embedded_help_contentsystem2018-06-13 02:48:06global/5adac4eb4fe29300874e8020a310c7760sys_ui_hp_publisher_list-normal6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed16ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1sys_embedded_help_content_5adac4eb4fe29300874e8020a310c776system2018-06-13 02:48:06k

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_6e6bc21b9f913200bde5f79ff57fcfb6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utils Script Include for the NeedIt application.</description><name>NeedItUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var NeedItUtils = Class.create();
NeedItUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	isDatePast: function(strDate){
		// Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
		var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
		var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
		
		// If the testdate is before rightnow, return true, else return false
		if (testdate.before(rightnow)) {
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	},
	
		isDateToday: function(strDate){
		
		// Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
		var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
		var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
		// Get the date portion of rightnow and testdate (no timestamp)
		var today = rightnow.getLocalDate();
		var istoday = testdate.getLocalDate();
	
		// Compare today and istoday to see if they are the same day
		if(today.compareTo(istoday) == 0){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	},
	
    type: 'NeedItUtils'

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Email Address Syntax Validate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    // Pass the Requested for email to the Script Include.  Store the return
    // value from the Script Include in the isEmail variable
    var isEmail = validateEmailAddress(current.u_requested_for_email);
    // If isEmail is false (email address syntax is not valid) do not save
    // the record.  Write an error message to the screen.
    if(isEmail == false){
        gs.addErrorMessage(current.u_requested_for_email + " is not a valid email address.  You must provide a valid email address.");
        current.setAbortAction(true);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-08 03:44:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>01e885f69f513200bde5f79ff57fcf52</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Email Address Syntax Validate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_01e885f69f513200bde5f79ff57fcf52</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-08 03:44:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=01e885f69f513200bde5f79ff57fcf52"/></record_update>
